title: ⚡️CloudChef: Your Robot Chef - Michellin-Star food at $12/hr (w/ Kitchen tour!)

Welcome, Nikil.
Thanks for having me, Six.

are used by like Michelin star chefs.
They're used
by fresh fast food restaurants, airline

commercial

to as early wage labor as compared to

it has culinary understanding better
than even
the best chefs in any single cuisine.
